title: Write & Draw (Notes Taker and Sketchbook for iPhone and iPad)
description: Create notes and sketches with your fingers using Write & Draw, featuring brushes, erasers, and social media integration.

details.description: Write & Draw is a versatile application that allows users to take notes and create sketches using their fingers. It offers various tools such as brushes, erasers, pencils, and text placement with different colors. Users can view thumbnails of all their drawings in the main view, save their creations as images or PDFs, and share them on Facebook or via email.
features: Variety of tools: brushes, erasers, pencils, text placement
Thumbnails of all drawings at the main view
Save creations as images or PDFs
Share on Facebook or via email
frameworks: Core Graphics for drawing and sketching
